BR.name: TRANSFORMERS PRIME™ The Game
BR.description: Ajuda o OPTIMUS PRIME e os AUTOBOTS a unir forças com os humanos amigos Jack, Miko e Raf para salvar a terra do MEGATRON e a sua nova arma secreta. Joga na pele de um dos teus AUTOBOTS preferidos, incluindo BUMBLEBEE e BULKHEAD enquanto combates em cenários únicos em redor do mundo para ajudar a derrotar os DECEPTICONS. Continua a batalha contra os teus amigos no modo Multijogador com 11 personagens jogáveis. TRANSFORMERS PRIME é um jogo de lutas na primeira pessoa com um misto de tiro, condução e combate de proximidade. Muda de forma e dá potência a cada um dos AUTOBOTS combatendo contra os DECEPTICONS.

CA.name: TRANSFORMERS PRIME™ The Game
CA.description: Help OPTIMUS PRIME and the AUTOBOTS join forces with human friends Jack, Miko and Raf to save the Earth from MEGATRON and his new secret weapon. Play as one of your favorite AUTOBOT characters including BUMBLEBEE and BULKHEAD as you battle through unique vistas around the world to help defeat the DECEPTICONS. Continue the battle against your friends in Multiplayer Mode with 11 playable characters. TRANSFORMERS PRIME is a third-person action-brawler with a mix of shooting, driving and melee combat. Change form and power up each AUTOBOT as you battle against the DECEPTICONS.

MX.name: TRANSFORMERS PRIME™ The Game
MX.description: Ayuda a OPTIMUS PRIME y a los AUTOBOTS a colaborar con sus amigos humanos, Jack, Miko y Raf, para salvar la Tierra de MEGATRON y de su nueva arma secreta. Juega con uno de tus personajes AUTOBOT favoritos, como BUMBLEBEE o BULKHEAD, y lucha en escenarios únicos de todo el mundo para ayudar a derrotar a los DECEPTICONS. Sigue con la batalla contra tus amigos en modo multijugador, con 11 personajes con los que jugar. TRANSFORMERS PRIME es un juego de acción y lucha que combina tiroteos, carreras de vehículos y combate cuerpo a cuerpo. Cambia de forma y acompaña a los AUTOBOTS en su batalla contra los DECEPTICONS.

Play as one of your favorite AUTOBOT characters including BUMBLEBEE and BULKHEAD as you battle through unique vistas around the world to help defeat the DECEPTICONS. Continue the battle against your friends in Multiplayer Mode with 11 playable characters. TRANSFORMERS PRIME is a third-person action-brawler with a mix of shooting, driving and melee combat. Change form and power up each AUTOBOT as you battle against the DECEPTICONS.
